about.title: About Us
about.description: Founded in 2010 in Burdur, DuruGenetik brings world-class livestock genetics and hands-on support to farms across the region.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: From pairing to calving we work beside your crew, keeping every milestone on schedule.

list.title: Genetic Planning
list.description: We map your herd data into clear, season-ready mating sets.

list.title: Lifecycle Support
list.description: Regular visits align feed, health and reporting routines.
